民德（mores）指的是与社会的福祉息息相关的规范。这些规范通常都包含一个民族最珍视的原则。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Latin, plural of mos, mor- 'custom'

entry.def: The mores of a particular place or group of people are the customs and behaviour that are typically found in that place or group.

example.ex: ...profound changes in social and sexual mores.
example.tran: 社会风俗和性习俗的深刻变化

means.word_mean: 1. (sociology) the conventions that embody the fundamental values of a group

stems_affixes.word_buile: non非+moral[adj.道德[上]的,精神上的 n.寓意,教育意义]→adj.与道德无关的
mor道德+al……的→adj.道德[上]的,精神上的 n.寓意,教育意义
mor道德+es表示复数→n.风俗习惯,道德观念
mor道德+al……的→adj.道德[上]的,精神上的 n.寓意,教育意义
mor道德+ale→[一群人]有道德精神→士气
